#summary How to use csvlib
#labels Featured

===load a csv file===

 * via constructor

{{{
import com.shortybmc.data.parser.CSV;

var csv : CSV = new CSV( new URLRequest('example-1.csv') );
csv.addEventListener( Event.COMPLETE, completeHandler );
}}}

 * or load method

{{{
import com.shortybmc.data.parser.CSV;

var csv : CSV = new CSV();
csv.addEventListener( Event.COMPLETE, completeHandler );
csv.load( new URLRequest('example-2.csv') )
}}}
